transArray.content: The room service staff helped to upgrade the room. The attitude of the waiter was very nice. There were a lot of free oranges and free tea, drinks and candies at the front desk. I would still recommend it and will stay here again if necessary.

Dear customer! Thank you very much for choosing Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. We always believe that a good reputation must be recommended from the most sincere satisfaction of the guests. Your support and recognition are very important to us. Detailed service has always been A long-standing focus of ours, we are honored to provide you with the highest quality service. We very much welcome you to choose our hotel again whether you are on a business trip or traveling. We sincerely look forward to your visit again and wish you a happy life! Manager: Zhao Dan
